verses.roman:
saṅkṣepe kahila janmalīlā-anukrama
ebe kahi bālyalīlā-sūtrera gaṇana

synonyms: saṅkṣepe—in brief; kahila—I have spoken; janma-līlā—the pastimes of birth; anukrama—chronological order; ebe—now; kahi—I shall speak; bālya-līlā—of the pastimes of childhood; sūtrera—of the sūtras; gaṇana—enumeration.
translation: I have already briefly spoken about the pastimes of His birth in chronological order. Now I shall give a synopsis of His childhood pastimes.
